tweet.html: RT @HistoryAtState: Writing back from Beijing in May 1975, George Bush reports he and #BarbaraBush "are happy out here. We feel we are most fortunate to be [...] in this fascinating land" history.state.gov/historicaldocu… 📷 @Bush41Library pic.twitter.com/AUJjReYFZX
